scriptData.label: Weirdroot

description.label: Description
description.value: One of the most common street-drugs in the Empire, Weirdroot is chewed, bringing a sense of euphoria and pleasant hallucinations, which some suggest may be connected to the Winds of Magic. The drug gives a +10 bonus to Toughness and Willpower Tests, but a penalty of –10 to Agility, Initiative, and Intelligence Tests. Duration: Active when chewed plus an additional [[/r 1d10 * 10]] minutes.
